alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 10:39AM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...The river will continue to be just below flood stage. * WHERE...Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.8 feet, Flood Stage, Minor lowland flooding begins throughout Mason Valley-Yerington area, with some inundation of lowlands and rural roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:20 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet late this morning. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.8 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when hiking or camping near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Sunday.
